/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobileCashList */ SELECT tsspc.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspc.CORNR_CD , tmc.CORNR_NM , tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG , DECODE(tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG, 1, '포스승인', 2, '단말기승인') AS APPR_PROC_NM , tsspc.VAN_CD , tcvc.VAN_NM , SUM(tsspc.SALE_AMT) AS APPR_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CASH tsspc , TB_MS_CORNER tmc , TB_CM_VAN_CMPNY tcvc , TB_CM_NMCODE tcn , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspc.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tmc.STORE_CD (+) = tsspc.STORE_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmc.CORNR_CD (+) = tsspc.CORNR_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tcvc.VAN_FG (+) = '01' /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tcvc.VAN_CD (+) = tsspc.VAN_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD (+) = '018' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD (+) = tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspc.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspc.STORE_CD
AND (tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG <> '3' OR tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG IS NULL)
AND tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG = '3'
AND tsspc.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tsspc.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
GROUP BY tsspc.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspc.CORNR_CD , tmc.CORNR_NM , tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG , tsspc.VAN_CD , tcvc.VAN_NM ORDER BY tsspc.STORE_CD , tsspc.CORNR_CD , tsspc.APPR_PROC_FG , tsspc.VAN_CD

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobilePaycoList */ SELECT tsspp.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspp.APPR_COMPANY_NM AS PAYCO_NM , SUM(DECODE(tsspp.SALE_YN, 'Y', 1, 0)) AS APPR_CNT , SUM(DECODE(tsspp.SALE_YN, 'Y', tsspp.APPR_AMT+tsspp.POINT_AMT, 0)) AS APPR_AMT , SUM(DECODE(tsspp.SALE_YN, 'N', 1, 0)) AS CANCEL_CNT , SUM(DECODE(tsspp.SALE_YN, 'N', tsspp.APPR_AMT+tsspp.POINT_AMT, 0)) AS CANCEL_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_PAYCO tsspp , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspp.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspp.STORE_CD
AND tsspp.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tsspp.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
GROUP BY tsspp.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspp.APPR_COMPANY_NM ORDER BY tsspp.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspp.APPR_COMPANY_NM

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobileVpointList */ SELECT tsspv.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspv.CASH_BILL_APPR_PROC_FG , SUM(tsspv.SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_VPOINT tsspv , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspv.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspv.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspv.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspv.STORE_CD
AND tsspv.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tsspv.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
GROUP BY tsspv.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspv.CASH_BILL_APPR_PROC_FG ORDER BY tsspv.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspv.CASH_BILL_APPR_PROC_FG

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobileVchargeList */ SELECT tsspv.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspv.CASH_BILL_APPR_PROC_FG , SUM(tsspv.SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_VCHARGE tsspv , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspv.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspv.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspv.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspv.STORE_CD

GROUP BY tsspv.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspv.CASH_BILL_APPR_PROC_FG ORDER BY tsspv.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspv.CASH_BILL_APPR_PROC_FG

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobileMpayList */ SELECT tsspm.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspm.MPAY_CD , tcn.NMCODE_NM AS MPAY_NM , SUM(DECODE(tsspm.SALE_YN, 'Y', 1, 0)) AS APPR_CNT , SUM(DECODE(tsspm.SALE_YN, 'Y', tsspm.APPR_AMT, 0)) AS APPR_AMT , SUM(DECODE(tsspm.SALE_YN, 'N', 1, 0)) AS CANCEL_CNT , SUM(DECODE(tsspm.SALE_YN, 'N', tsspm.APPR_AMT, 0)) AS CANCEL_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_MPAY tsspm , TB_CM_NMCODE tcn , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspm.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspm.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspm.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspm.STORE_CD AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD (+)= '109' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD (+)= tsspm.MPAY_CD

AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tsspm.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
GROUP BY tsspm.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspm.MPAY_CD , tcn.NMCODE_NM ORDER BY tsspm.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspm.MPAY_CD , tcn.NMCODE_NM

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobileMcoupnList */ SELECT tsspm.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspm.SALE_YN , tsspm.MCOUPN_CD , tsspm.MCOUPN_TYPE_FG , SUM(tsspm.SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_MCOUPN tsspm , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspm.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspm.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspm.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspm.STORE_CD

GROUP BY tsspm.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspm.SALE_YN , tsspm.MCOUPN_CD , tsspm.MCOUPN_TYPE_FG ORDER BY tsspm.STORE_CD , tsspm.SALE_YN , tsspm.MCOUPN_CD , tsspm.MCOUPN_TYPE_FG

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobilePointList */ SELECT tsspp.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspp.MEMBR_NO , SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM , tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD , tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM , tmmc.POINT_SAVE_FG , tcn.NMCODE_NM AS POINT_SAVE_FG_NM , tmmc.DC_RATE , SUM(tsspp.SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_POINT tsspp , TB_MS_CORNER tmc , TB_MB_MEMBER tmm , TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc , TB_CM_NMCODE tcn , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspp.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspp.STORE_CD AND tmc.STORE_CD (+) = tsspp.STORE_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmc.CORNR_CD (+) = tsspp.CORNR_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD (+) = #{hqOfficeCd} /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmm.MEMBR_NO (+) = tsspp.MEMBR_NO /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD (+) = #{hqOfficeCd} /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD (+) = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD (+) = '054' /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tcn.NMCODE_CD (+) = tmmc.POINT_SAVE_FG /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobilePostpaidList */ SELECT tsspp.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspp.MEMBR_NO , SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM , tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD , tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM , tmmc.POINT_SAVE_FG , tcn.NMCODE_NM AS POINT_SAVE_FG_NM , tmmc.DC_RATE , SUM(tsspp.SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_POSTPAID tsspp , TB_MS_CORNER tmc , TB_MB_MEMBER tmm , TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc , TB_CM_NMCODE tcn , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspp.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspp.STORE_CD AND tmc.STORE_CD (+) = tsspp.STORE_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmc.CORNR_CD (+) = tsspp.CORNR_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD (+) = #{hqOfficeCd} /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmm.MEMBR_NO (+) = tsspp.MEMBR_NO /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD (+) = #{hqOfficeCd} /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD (+) = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD (+) = '054' /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */ AND tcn.NMCODE_CD (+) = tmmc.POINT_SAVE_FG /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobileGiftList */ SELECT tsspgd.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tcn.NMCODE_NM AS GIFT_PROC_FG_NM , SUM(tsspgd.GIFT_UPRC * tsspgd.GIFT_QTY) AS GIFT_TOT_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_GIFT_DTL tsspgd , TB_CM_NMCODE tcn , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspgd.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspgd.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspgd.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspgd.STORE_CD AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '048' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD = tsspgd.GIFT_PROC_FG AND tms.STORE_CD (+) = tsspgd.STORE_CD /* 개발엔 자료가 없어서 (+) 검. 나중엔 (+) 빼야함. */

/* MobilePayInfoMapper.getMobileEmpCardList */ SELECT tsspec.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tsspec.OFFICE_NM , tsspec.OFFICE_DEPT_NM , tsspec.OFFICE_EMP_NO , tsspec.OFFICE_EMP_NM , tsspec.ACCOUNT_FG , SUM(tsspec.SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT , SUM(tsspec.REMAIN_AMT) AS REMAIN_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_EMP_CARD tsspec , TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tsspec.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tsspec.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tsspec.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tsspec.STORE_CD
